name: Git Diff Viewer
description: A simple Replit extension for viewing .diff files
longDescription:
A simple extension that allows you to view a rich diff from a .diff file.
Features:
* Rich diffs (red/green highlighting)
* Character counts

To use the extension, right click on a .diff file and open it in Diff Viewer. Or, open the extension's pane and browse to a .diff file

Powered by [diff2html](https://github.com/rtfpessoa/diff2html)

coverImages.label: Screenshot of an example diff file being viewed
